Description: Welcome to our NO RESERVE auction! You are bidding on a NICE Carvin SC-90 model electric guitar. Guitar features a natural high gloss finish, alder body, maple neck-through design, ebony fingerboard with block inlays, locking Sperzel tuners, and OHSC. Condition:The guitar is in fantastic shape. I found 2 small dings (smaller that the tip of a ballpoint pen), one on the top of the body, one on the back. That's all I see. There are no scratches/gouges/cracks in the finish. The frets have virtually no wear at all. The truss rod turns freely as it should. The truss rod cover is engraved with the previous owner's name. The electronics work as they should and the action is low and phenomenal. The guitar/case does come from a smoking household so if you have a super sensitive sniffer this might not be the guitar for you. The G&G tweed style case is nice inside. The outside looks like it was attacked by a feral animal with claws. Keys for the case and truss rod tool are included. Guitar weighs 6lbs 14 ozs. Carvin's record keeping isn't the greatest but I'd guess this is a 1995 or 1996 model (don't hold me to it). The collection of guitars I have purchased from this estate have run from 1995-2000. According to Carvin the SC-90 was discontinued in 1996 (the SC-90s is still a current production guitar). This guitar is one of the best sounding "out of the box" or unmodified guitars I've heard. The neck through design allows easy access to all the frets. Great looking/sounding piece. Please email me with any questions or requests for more pictures. FREE Shipping will either be USPS Priority Mail or FedEx ground (lower 48 states and no PO BOXES please) depending on final destination and weight of package. Payment is due within 3 days of auction end.
Title: NICE! Carvin SC-90 Single Cutaway Electric Guitar OHSC Gorgeous!  FREE SHIPPING!
